column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers who have a partner company) ), XMK (Cross Market).

column.name: FEATURE_CODE
column.comment: This field contains the feature code

column.name: PREPAID_IND
column.comment: Indicates wether the subscriber's BAN has a prepaid (debit) account, credit account or callya roaming account. Valid values are:  Y - prepaid, R - prepaid roaming, N - credit.

column.name: CHARGE_TYPE
column.comment: Empty for Credit and MTM- Valid values for Debit: S - Standard, D - Discount, NULL - regular SMS

column.name: FTR_REVENUE_CODE
column.comment: Defines whether the charge information refers to usage charge, one time charge or recurring charge. Each one of these categories may contain different tax rates or GL (General Ledger) information. Valid values: "O" - one time charge, "R" - recurring charge, "U" - usage charge.

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_CREATION_TIME
column.comment: Time of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_TIME
column.comment: Time of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: INVOICE_TYPE
column.comment: The attribute defines the type of invoice item under which the charge is summarized. Valid values: B - Billing, D - Deposit, E - Equipment Deposit, R - Refund, Q - Equipment (RMS).

column.name: BL_INCL_PRST_IND
column.comment: The bill include presentation indicator determines whether or not the specific charge should be displayed on the bill. Valid values: (Y) / N.

column.name: BL_ZERO_CHG_PRST_IN
column.comment: The zero charges presentation indicator determines whether or not a zero charge should be displayed on the bill. Vaild values: (Y) / N.

column.name: CSM_PRST_CODE
column.comment: The Customer Service Presentation code assigns each charge to a bill summary category. Valid values: "01" - Monthly Charges, "02" - One Time Charges, "03" - Airtime charges, "04" - Additional Usg Charge, "05" - Toll Charges, "06" - Roaming Charges.

column.name: DEF_BAL_IMPACT_CD
column.comment: The Default Balance Impact Code is used to determine whether the selected charge impacts the balance immediately or at bill day. Valid values: "B" - Billing, "I" - Immidiate.

column.name: MANUAL_OC_CREATE_IND
column.comment: This attribute indicates whether or not the user is authorized to manually create an OC charge for the selected charge. For charges that may be created manually it will be "Y" for other charges it will be "N".

column.name: MNL_OC_TXT_OVRD_IND
column.comment: The Manual OC Amount Override Indicator specifies whether or not the user is authorized to manually override the prices appearing in the price-plan.

column.name: MNL_OC_CHRG_LEVEL
column.comment: The Manual OC Charge Level attribute indicates the level of a charge that has been manually created. The possible levels are: "B" = BAN, "C" = Subscriber.

column.name: MNL_OC_AMT_OVRD_IND
column.comment: The Manual OC Amount Override Indicator specifies whether or not the user is authorized to manually override the prices appearing in the price-plan.

column.name: TAX_CODE
column.comment: Tax code

column.name: ELIG_LATE_PYM_IND
column.comment: This attribute indicates whether a specific charge is to be included in the late payment calculation amount.

column.name: FEATURE_CATEGORY
column.comment: This field contains the category of feature codes

column.name: OCC_CODE
column.comment: Encryption of the reason for issuing a credit or debit, whereby the ARCOR connections are booked as a debit

column.name: REVENUE_RELEVANT
column.comment: This field is for the revenue calculations for individual prepaid accounts.

column.name: PASS_THROUGH_AMT
column.comment: This field will help the billing Cycle Revenue Report to allocate the charges that are collected by MMO but are also passed through in full to other companies.

column.name: COMMISSION_SYS_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether this charge or adjustment should be sent to the commission system (PROVIS).

column.name: VAS_SMS_IND
column.comment: Indicates if the feature is a VAS or SMS in order to count the number of charges.

column.name: ROAMING_IND
column.comment: The field is set depending on the value of the source field CALL_TYPE: Y is set for C, E, T or U, otherwise N.

column.name: VOUCH_IN_REV_FORM
column.comment: Indicates if this voucher feature should be considered in the revenue formula.

column.name: VOUCH_IN_INV_FORM
column.comment: Indicates if this voucher feature should be considered in the invoice formula.

column.name: USAGE_GRP_TYPE
column.comment: Indicator for group of calls. Valid values: "A" - Inland-Calls, "B" - Roam-Calls, "C" - Inland-Fax-Data, "D" - Roam-Fax-Data, "O" - Other.

column.name: ETF_IND
column.comment: Early Termination Fee Indicator

column.name: BT_IND
column.comment: Balance Transfer Indicator: C - BT Charge,M - BT Margin

column.name: AR_PRODUCT_IND
column.comment: Value 'H' if the feature_code represents hardware costs else NULL
